**Here's an interesting fact**: if Bard's ultimate work like Zhonya in fact it's very similar to it, then how come it doesn't work on everyone? (morgana spellshield,olaf ultimate,poppy ult on the opposite team). if these champions pop zhonya during their anti-crowd-control zhonya will work then why bard ultimate isn't working when faced against? If his ultimate give a free zhonya in some sort to anybody would it be safe to say that it should work on anyone no matter what are their status condition?

There's a difference between using your own activated item, and being hit by a spell from another character.

It's supposed to look and feel a lot like Zhonya's, sure - but it's not supposed to be _exactly_ the same.

If someone teleports to one of Zac's blobs, the blob doesn't move and he has to wait for it to get to it's body
Is this a bug?

Zac's passive I believe is coded based on how long the blobs are left alive, rather than whether the blobs meet up in the center.

This is why if you {{summoner:12}} to Zac blob, he will revive, even though you froze the blobs position.

Its intentional, I believe they stated this somewhere before using Sion's passive as an example. He won't be able to move, but his health still slowly drains.

Passive effects will still complete, but you character is rendered in a stasis.

Think Fiddlesticks using his ult and then using {{item:3157}}'s active. Its kind of the same situation.
